description: Swift trackers masters of speed and precision striking who embody the principle of perfect connection and instant response. Hunters represent the ultimate expression of Voltharion's philosophy - that true mastery comes through lightning-fast connection between awareness and action.

origin_island.description: A realm of crackling energy and interconnected networks where information travels at the speed of light and action follows thought. The culture values speed, precision, and the ability to respond instantly to changing conditions.
origin_island.cultural_philosophy: Strike fast, strike true, never be where the enemy expects. Connection enables understanding, speed enables victory.

eldritch_connection.divine_manifestation: Voltharion, the Cosmic Spark - Lightning connection and instant response
eldritch_connection.player_freedom: Players can choose any god alignment or remain independent
eldritch_connection.cultural_pressure: Lightning Web culture encourages Voltharion worship but respects those who demonstrate mastery of speed and precision regardless of divine alignment

damage_type_affinity.cultural_preference: Lightning damage is revered as the purest expression of speed and connection
damage_type_affinity.mechanical_freedom: No restrictions on learning or mastering other damage types
damage_type_affinity.starting_bonus: Enhanced effectiveness with lightning-based abilities and resistance to electrical effects

attribute_inheritance.growth_pattern: Exceptional dexterity growth, strong intelligence development, moderate adaptability
attribute_inheritance.cultural_development: Lightning Web education emphasizes speed training, precision exercises, and rapid response protocols

class_characteristics.core_philosophy: Strike fast, strike true, never be where the enemy expects
class_characteristics.life_approach: Connect instantly, respond perfectly, maintain constant awareness
class_characteristics.combat_style: Hit-and-run tactics, precision strikes, mobility-based warfare, environmental advantage
signature_abilities: Lightning Speed - Enhanced movement and reaction capabilities
Perfect Tracking - Exceptional ability to follow and locate targets
Precision Striking - Unmatched accuracy in attacks and actions
Network Awareness - Connection to information and communication networks
Instant Response - Ability to react faster than others can plan

cultural_background.typical_upbringing: Raised in the high-speed environment of the Lightning Web, trained from childhood in rapid response and precision techniques
cultural_background.social_expectations: Expected to serve as scouts, messengers, and rapid response specialists for the community
common_motivations: Serving as a vital communication link
Pushing the boundaries of reaction time and accuracy

traditional_progression: Novice Tracker - Basic hunting and speed skills
Web Runner - Recognized courier and scout of the Lightning Web
Master Hunter - Advanced tracking and precision combat abilities
Elder Speedster - Legendary speed and awareness mastery
Eternal Scout - Mythical status with perfect connection to all networks
alternative_developments: Battle Striker - Applying speed and precision to front-line combat
Information Broker - Using tracking skills for intelligence gathering
Network Coordinator - Managing communication and logistics systems
Cross-Realm Explorer - Specializing in rapid reconnaissance of unknown territories

multiclass_synergies: Hunter/Succubus - Mobile infiltrator with enhanced tracking and adaptation
Hunter/Warrior - Speed-focused fighter with tactical mobility
Hunter/Lich - Mobile researcher with enhanced information gathering

player_customization.personality_freedom: Players can be lone wolves, team players, methodical stalkers, or impulsive strikers
player_customization.moral_alignment: Can be protective guardians, neutral professionals, or predatory hunters
player_customization.social_approach: Can be silent observers, quick communicators, patient trackers, or dynamic leaders

hexagon_integration.offensive_layer_preference: Swift Strikes - Lightning-fast attacks that overwhelm through speed
hexagon_integration.defensive_layer_preference: Evasive Maneuvers - Avoiding damage through superior mobility and positioning

adjacent_class_relationships.succubus: Shared dexterity focus creates natural mobility and stealth synergies
adjacent_class_relationships.warrior: Complementary dexterity/strength enables mobile combat tactics

opposing_class_tension.priestess: Speed vs. Contemplation - Fundamental difference between instant action and thoughtful consideration

lore_connections.divine_positioning: Aligned with Position 3 - The Web of Connection
lore_connections.cosmic_significance: Represents the principle that consciousness can transcend distance through perfect connection and instant communication
lore_connections.mythological_role: The eternal messengers of Yggdrasil's network, maintaining communication across cosmic distances
lore_connections.island_legends: Famous Hunters have served as crucial links in major communications, enabling coordination across vast distances and time

typical_representatives: Web-Master Kethran - Chief coordinator of the Lightning Web's communication network
Tracker Prime Vexion - Leading expert on inter-realm scouting and reconnaissance
Elder Scout Thalassa - Ancient Hunter who remembers the paths between reality instances
cultural_variations: Battle-Striker Korven - Hunter who applies speed skills to front-line tactical combat
Information Broker Zelda - Hunter focused on intelligence gathering and analysis
Wandering Explorer Theron - Hunter who travels to map and scout unknown territories

player_freedom_emphasis.damage_type_openness: While naturally aligned with lightning, Hunters can master cold, fire, chaos, physical, or radiance without restriction
player_freedom_emphasis.divine_choice: Can worship any god, practice multiple faiths, or remain independent trackers
player_freedom_emphasis.personality_range: From protective guardians to methodical stalkers to impulsive strikers to team coordinators
player_freedom_emphasis.social_roles: Can be scouts, messengers, warriors, investigators, or leaders depending on player choice
player_freedom_emphasis.moral_flexibility: Can be protective guardians, neutral professionals, or predatory hunters - the class supports all approaches

suggested_starting_stats.other_attributes: Standard starting values with room for player customization
